alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Menominee; Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:43PM CDT until May 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Menominee County in northeastern Wisconsin... Northern Oconto County in northeastern Wisconsin... East central Langlade County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 343 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Big Smokey Falls, or 19 miles north of Shawano, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mountain, Gardner Dam Scout Camp, Big Smokey Falls, Bear Paw Scout Camp, South Branch, Neopit, Legend Lake, Keshena, Lakewood and Breed. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
